item.title: Litter, 28th December
item.description:
Lots of litter in King and Queen Close. All over the parking bays to the right plus a brown paper bag full of human shit into the Close and round to the right It’s been put near the bushes. Absolutely disgusting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King and Queen Close, Elmstead, Greater London

item.description:

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Massive pot hole on curb over 10inc, 28th December
item.description:
Hi - I know it says be polite but big pot on on road indicated when driving back in evening and filled with water did not see which resulted cracking wheel and puncturing tyre which was not drivable . I left car on side road had no choice as it ripped tyre and car only has repair kit not spare tyre . Had to find tyre shop on Sunday which cost £150 got receipt . Will also have to get alloy repaired

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
